sentences: At the final plenary session, which ran into the early hours of Sunday, 25 September, delegates approved the revised draft SPM (8th WG III/Doc.
1), the Adjustments to the Technical Summary and Chapters for consistency with the approved SPM (8th WG III/Doc.
2c), and the Underlying Scientific and Technical Assessment in the Special Report (8th WG III/Doc.
WG III agreed to pass on its best wishes to the family of the late Dr. David Pearce.
Co-Chair Metz closed the meeting at 1:15 am.
